entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
